name: BLACK RUNES
description:
You have been offered to buy a country house at a very attractive price. You came to see the house and when you entered, the doors closed. There is a book with black runes on the table and when you take it, EVIL wakes up.

Immersive experience

An atmospheric, believable environment intensifies the horror experience.

Psychological horror

You have to move through time and space, perhaps even into another reality. The game will drive you insane.

You have to

-Search for objects.
-Combining items.
-Solving puzzles and riddles.
-Fight off attacks from otherworldly forces.
-Explore the unknown.
